items.name: INNOVIRIS Co-Create 2026
items.description: FOI-RESPOND project: Understanding and Improving FOI Responsiveness in Brussels. 36-month co-research programme with Anticor Belgique. Requested budget: €360,000.

items.name: FER — ULB
items.description: Fonds d'Encouragement à la Recherche. Supporting TRANSACT international expansion: field experiments in Romania and Switzerland.

items.name: FNRS
items.description: Fonds de la Recherche Scientifique. Funded the International Research Meeting on FOI (March 2025, ULB Brussels) with 49 participants from 10+ countries.
